about_the_game:
Several centuries ago, the Roman Empire filled the expanses of Europe, its greatness and power were undeniable. However, great ambitions also bring great challenges. The Empire is faced with vile enemies - barbarians and Gauls, who are eager to tear its territory apart.

Each morning ray prepares a new battle. Enemy raids on the camp are inevitable, and each repulsed attack is a step towards the liberation of the Roman lands. New challenges and new solutions lie ahead. But the determination and leadership qualities of the leader will restore the lands of the Roman Empire and restore trust in his name.



It's time to gather and lead an army, become a legendary commander and return the occupied lands. All this is possible in Roman Conquest: Rise to Power, a turn-based strategy game about the Roman Empire.

Immerse yourself in the history of the Roman Empire as a warrior, learn all the intricacies of military affairs and defense, fight against the Gauls and liberate your territories.

The game was created in tower defense mode and has a small, but fascinating and deep storyline that helps to feel the situation to the fullest.

Peculiarities:
    • acquaintance with new territories of Italy;
    • a large selection of towers and structures with different types of weapons and defenses;
    • improvement of buildings to increase the effectiveness of the fight;
    • upgrade weapons and equipment;
    • a complex of additional sources of income on the territory of the military camp (wheat field, lumberjack, etc.).
